name: DiteCross
body:
![Ditecross example](https://github.com/corsaroquad/DiteCross/raw/master/readme_assets/example.png)

### What is it?
DiteCross is a _twin bot_ that helps Telegram and Discord users connect with each other. Currently, it uses a _handshake system_ to connect one Telegram private chat/group with another one. DiteCross must be added to each Telegram and Discord groups in order to process your messages and relay them to the linked chat.

### How do I make the handshake?
1. To get started, add [DiteCross](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=204892560475422730&scope=bot&permissions=3072) to your Discord server
2. Contact [@DiteCross_bot](https://telegram.me/DiteCross_bot) on Telegram and, if you have a group, add the bot to it
2. Type the command `/handshake` on Telegram chat
3. The bot will ask `What is the server and the channel you want to handshake?`. Simply send a message like `@MyFunnyServer#crosschannel` where `MyFunnyServer` is the target Discord's server name and `crosschannel` the target channel name
4. Go to Discord and type `/handshake` to confirm and link the groups
5. Enjoy!

Note: If you want to revert back, you can type anytime the command `/cancel`. DiteCross will confirm with a message like `Handshake cancelled`.

### How do I self host?
DiteCross is Open Source, so you can self host it by yourself. Simply go to the [technical page](https://github.com/corsaroquad/DiteCross) and follow the guide.

### Support or Contact
